EmailTemplate.description: Alternative options to setup a NASTC Fuel card Account
EmailTemplate.name: Credit Options for NASTC Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Options for NASTC Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
I am contacting you to discuss your application for the NASTC fuel card program. As I understand it, you applied for a credit line and for whatever reason was declined .
Please understand that there are still several additional methods you have to get the NASTC fuel card with the discounts .
1. Resend the application with another signer.
2. Obtain Letter of credit from your bank (sample attached)
3. Do a prepaid account. (call for exact details)
4. Do a cash Deposit account (call for details)
5. Contact your NASTC Rep asking concerning their factoring program.
If completing a new Electronic Application please do not complete on a cell phone.
All of these methods are good and all will allow you to take advantage of the great savings offered by the good people at NASTC.
Thank you!!!
John
